title: New: Jamie Isaac – Softly Draining Seas
body:
Eighteen months on from first unearthing London wonderkid **Jamie Isaac**, and he’s finally releasing his long awaited debut single and EP.

_Softly Draining Seas_, previously heard in demo version, is an atmospheric, touching number; poignant and haunting in equal measures. Having seen him performing at CitR Live #001 at the end of last week, it’s clear that this kid is going to go far and deservedly so. Check out _Softly Draining Seas_ below.
